title: There is a bright green light that appeared in the lower left of my screen, is there a way to fix?
content: There's a small bright green light that is in the lower left of my screen, and it persists through anything, even the screen being in sleep mode.  Only turning the phone off makes it go away.  I believe its a series of stuck pixels, but all apps that I download in order to fix the problem haven't done so.
